fields.summary: FairScheduler: Reserve preempted resources for corresponding applications

fields.description: We found a limitation in the implementation of YARN-6432. If the container released is smaller than the preemption request, a node reservation is created that is never deleted.
fields.summary: [FairScheduler] Preemption reservation may cause regular reservation leaks

This message was automatically generated.
The failing unit tests are not related to the change.
Can you create followup JIRAs for my question and suggestion? Otherwise looks good to me.
I opened YARN-6925 and YARN-6926. Thank you!
+1. Thanks for the patch, [~miklos.szegedi@cloudera.com]. Committed to trunk. It doesn't apply to branch-2. Can you rebase it to branch-2?
